one SBUY is selected to prevent empty files for Demica)

... create SCFH (header) only once --> has to be only created if at least one SBUY is selected

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/CLNT where CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only
